website_summaries.verdict: Quilted waterproof KEEN women's winter boot featuring faux-fur collar and lace-up vamp.
pros: Made of leather and faux fur
Dual climate rubber outsole provides traction
cons: Can be stiff around the ankles and calves

customer_reviews.title: this is a great boot !
customer_reviews.text: I am extremely pleased with the Hoodoo III boots. They are very light weight, stylish, and my feet were not sore at the end of a long work day. I live in Montana and work outside at times during the winter. My feet were warm and completely dry; thru snow all day. They arrived on time and have exceeded my expectations. I have received many compliments on them, and have noticed many others looking. They just might be the first ones in Gallatin County. I highly recommend these boots.
customer_reviews.author: Ravenstone, Big Sky, MT

customer_reviews.title: Should be great for MN WINTER!
customer_reviews.text: Returning them for a 1/2 size larger, ""she loves them""" especially the fuzzy at the top, BTW, these boots are rated at -25F (TAG SAYS SO INSIDE), nice side zipper, seams very sturdy..
customer_reviews.author: Mitch

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, great traction
customer_reviews.text: Love. These. Boots. Incredibly comfortable and warm. First time I wore them was for two hours in 14 degree cold. Feet and lower legs stayed toasty warm. Excellent support in the foot and ankle with a spacious toe-box common with Keens. Ordered a half size up which fit well, but with the thick wool socks I’ll usually wear them with, a full size larger wouldn’t have been a bad idea. Best pair of boots I’ve ever had.
customer_reviews.author: IrishChupa

customer_reviews.title: Same toe box, sole, and shape as targhee II but fewer seams and in boot shape
customer_reviews.text: These boots are the boot equivalent of the Targhee II. They have fewer seams and so will be more waterproof at the end of the day than the Targhee (my go-to boot). The fluff trim looks cute but I worry it will just be an extra way to store water in wet conditions. If you wear shorter socks it feels like the side zipper may rub. They are extraordinarily comfortable (like the targhee) and attractive. When I say fits as expected I mean it fits as you would expect your keen to fit... so order a size up!
customer_reviews.author: Lady of K

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: These are fantastic boots, and I got them at OH SUCH A HUGE DISCOUNT!!! They are quite functional, but fashionable enough to stand on their own as a winter accessory. We had subzero temps for more than two weeks, but I was never at anytime uncomfortable outside when walking from my car to work. The shipping speed was stellar, and I am very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Seeker

customer_reviews.title: Comfort NO-Dry Yes
customer_reviews.text: Would of liked the boot to be a bit larger so a heavy sock could be used. Also, the biggest issue is there is NO CUSHION inner sole, and since the boot isn't too large no room for a nice gel cushion inner sole, it's not easy to wear a long time. Boot is stiff around the ankle, the leather is strong so the boot doesn't flex too easily. It's it WARM and keeps feet dry, but not as comfortable as it could be for the $$$ price.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper's Review

customer_reviews.title: I have wide feet with the need for a good arch. These boots worked very well
customer_reviews.text: I have only used once when walking in the woods with snow nearly up to my knees (I'm 5 feet) and the temperature was 19. No snow got in the boots, but my toes got a little cold while in the deep snow. I was wearing medium wood socks. Toes didn't get cold when on a path that was beaten down at that temperature. I ordered the same size as my Keen hiking shoes and they fit the same. I have wide feet with the need for a good arch. These boots worked very well. I would have given them 5 stars if they would have come in black and gray.
customer_reviews.author: H.aMazing

customer_reviews.title: Cute and warm, but inside sole is hard.
customer_reviews.text: I really like these boots a lot, except for the fact that they are hard as a rock inside when you step down. I love the outside, they are super cute, they keep your feet and ankles very warm and dry, and the sizing was true for me. I have a slightly wider foot and needed a bigger toe box so these work great. I only gave 4 stars due to the inside being so hard. I do not consider my feet sensitive either having been a runner for awhile. I recommend trying these on first before buying or just getting some inserts.
customer_reviews.author: E

customer_reviews.title: Warm but not grippy
customer_reviews.text: Nice and warm, good stability, and the side zipper allows for easy on/off while the laces at the front allow you to adjust the fit. Edit: for winter boots, the traction on these is really lacking. If you're worried about slipping on ice, look for something with more grip. They're fine in mild winters, but this year I was in a deeper icy winter in the Cascades and broke my arm slipping on icy deck stairs while wearing these.
customer_reviews.author: Ash B

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed for warmth
customer_reviews.text: Cute style, but not at all warm as described. I have been a huge Keen fan and after reading multiple reviews, pulled the trigger and purchased these boots. I live in cold Massachusetts and love to be outdoors. I was looking for boots to keep my feet warm and found these boots very disappointing. Even with my heaviest socks, my feet were chilly after 15 minutes and proceeded to get colder from there. Would not recommend for warmth.
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Love Keen boots!
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots so much that I found myself wanting to wear them even in the summer!! They are so easy. I did up the laces and then used the zipper for on and off. If I have heavy jeans I can loosen laces to make more room to tuck them in. They are super comfortable and toasty! Super cute, too!! I was not paid for any reviews.
customer_reviews.author: suzyinNH

customer_reviews.title: Great winter boots
customer_reviews.text: Stylish and comfortable winter boots. I did have to order one half size up, although boots are always different than shoes. Once I had the right pair, they fit as comfortably as hiking boots. I immediately wore then for an entire weekend walking around NYC with no problems "breaking them in." They protected my feet from both the cold and the wet, and I really like having the control of the laces with the east of the zipper. The brown/black color combo is extremely versatile. I'm very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amaz0n_Buyer

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for a winter trip to Poland and they did not disappoint! Very warm when paired with REI wool socks and definitely waterproof (tested thoroughly in many many puddles!), No blisters when I walked long distances and I highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Great Winter Boots
customer_reviews.text: I've never owned shoes or boots from Keen before, but I've always heard good things. These boots have been great for simply trekking around & running errands, walking my dogs, etc. I'll be testing them out in Iceland in March for hiking, too. They're warm, waterproof, and comfortable. Two tips: 1) Plan to wear high socks. The stitching toward the top of the boot sticks out a bit where the boot laces, and it rubs a bit on my lower calf. 2) I normally wear an 8-8.5 M in women's shoes. 9 M works perfectly with these boots because I like to wear thick wool socks. If not for the thick socks, these would fit true to size.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly K.

customer_reviews.title: Nice boot but not for me
customer_reviews.text: Wore them to a parade with Alpaca socks & my toes were cold the whole time. Nice boot but not for me. I wear an 8 & it fit to good so I would recommend a half size up for thicker socks & roomy toe circulation. I have a lot of Keen shoes & they are great but not all Keen are created equal as a couple of my Keen are not as comfortable as others & this one didn't work for me but may for you.
customer_reviews.author: P. Hawkins

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, yet functional with quality construction.
customer_reviews.text: Exceeded my expectations. Very well made, very comfortable but you will want to put in a custom insert on top of whatever is in there already. This makes the footbed the right size - not too loose, not too tight. I love the zipper for easy on, easy off - a must with boots IMHO! Seems like quality construction that will last for years. Might be a good idea to treat the leather with a waterproofing agent...but aside from that, stylish and functional. Can't wait to wear them out and about the PNW.
customer_reviews.author: Wonderwomanrules

customer_reviews.title: Perfect and comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: These are the most comfortable winter boots I've ever purchased. We went for a hike in below zero weather, and unfortunately my right toes got cold. I falsely assumed that because they are rated for 25 below zero, I could just wear regular socks, next time I'll put on my wool. I'm still over the moon with the quality of these boots!
customer_reviews.author: The Trok Family

customer_reviews.title: comfy
customer_reviews.text: These boots are wonderful! I like the black color combo very much, the faux fur trim, the tread and best of all these boots have a zipper, besides the laces. I find them really comfortable, but then again, I was happy with all the KEEN shoes I've bought over the years. Here in Maine they seem like the perfect all-around winter boot. They are perhaps not "fine" or ultra feminine, but they are practical, quite safe in slippery conditions, warm and I think they do look great!
customer_reviews.author: Europa

customer_reviews.title: Good Boots
customer_reviews.text: Fits the girlfriend well, is warm, easy to take off and has a good boot height working well with other winter clothes. water beads up and rolls off (applied some Snow Seal*) and snow has no chance. used boots to Christmas tree cut in National Forest. Good earth tone colors work well with all outfits (Note my sense of fashion is not great), but I like the boot color and style. The boots have held up durability wise for two winters now. So far so good. Happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Spamgoessplat

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful boots. Very comfortable and keep my feet very ...
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: There is a small squeaking noise on 1 boot when I walk. I have determined it has to do with one of the rubber pads underneath. Thankfully it is finally spring so I don't have to listen to that squeak everywhere I go. After a full winter season of use, the zipper is having some trouble. The zipper still works, but does feel like it might break at some point in time. Wonderful boots. Very comfortable and keep my feet very warm. I primarily wear ankle socks with them and my feet are very toasty. Nice tight fit, well made, love these boots!
customer_reviews.author: Leah

customer_reviews.title: Roomy
customer_reviews.text: These seem solidly made, but I've not yet had a chance to test them in the elements. An unusually good amount of room for my toes, they feel comfortable while a bit stiff around the ankle and calf. Very cute on. The side zipper is a bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Favorite boots ever
customer_reviews.text: I have several pairs of Keen boots because they feel better than any other brand. These were my second pair of the Hoodoo 3 because I found that the first pair quickly became the only boots I wore this last winter. So I got them in a different color. They're so easy to pull on, and have perfect support for my picky feet. ❤
customer_reviews.author: KJ

customer_reviews.title: ... around the house to make sure they will be comfortable for my job that is outside and on my ...
customer_reviews.text: I have not yet gotten to test them in the elements but I have worn them around the house to make sure they will be comfortable for my job that is outside and on my feet for 3 hours a day. I think they will be perfect. The boot is a bit stiff, but not uncomfortable over the top of my foot. They are warm and not too heavy!
customer_reviews.author: MoSchu

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, very warm, true fit to size
customer_reviews.text: This Keen Women's Hoodoo III Winter boot was purchased as a gift for my wife. She absolutely loves the fit (as advertised - no size up or down needed). Comfort is all day long in cold snow weather, and she says that her feet never felt cold after hours outside this most recent cold snap of 8 degrees F for a high! Traction is very good on snow and ice. The zipper functions well, does not get caught. While wearing this boot, she receives compliments to its style!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Puckett

customer_reviews.title: Great boots, order up a size.
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots. I have a big bunion and narrow heels, so I have a hard time finding shoes and boots that fit. I also need boots with a removable insole. These fit beautifully, although I did go up one full size. They’re also cute and very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: scotty

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: Very light and comfy. I bought a half size up to accommodate wool socks (MN winters can be rough). They are a bit big without thick socks but that is okay, they are still comfy! Great grip on slippery surfaces! Very happy with them. Great PRICE too!
customer_reviews.author: mf

customer_reviews.title: These Rock! Great Comfortable Boots
customer_reviews.text: These rock and Keen shoes/boots are the best! I've had a ton of compliments this season and expect I'll receive many more for several years. I have worn these all day teaching and my feet were fine. I have other Keens and love them too. I scored a great deal on these but they are worth the full price.
customer_reviews.author: ishcabah

customer_reviews.title: Warm, easy to put on, best snow boots.
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy with these! I came to write a review because someone mentioned they fit tight on their calves, NO WAY! I am a big woman and boots rarely fit my calves and these are wonderful. I love that they have the laces and then a zipper, so I don't have to spend time with my arthritic hands lacing up boots every morning. I bought these to replace my 15 year old UGGs, and I love them. They are warm, fit perfect, great grip and water/snowproof. I have put these to the test this winter and would highly recommend. These are very quality construction and I hope they last me a long time. Buy these!
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: I love KEEN. I just bought the Hoodoo III winter ...
customer_reviews.text: I love KEEN. I just bought the Hoodoo III winter boots Cascade in a 10.5. I usually buy 10 wide or 10.5 in other shoes so thought I'd try the Hoodoo in 10.5. I'm going to exchange them for a 10. Ample room in toe box in a size 10.5, too much for my short wide toes, so I'm exchanging for a 10 instead.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Eddington

customer_reviews.title: Perfect winter boots!
customer_reviews.text: These are exactly what I was looking for! I tried MANY boots before I settled on these - they are worth the price! I ordered a half-size up to accomodate thicker socks and they are perfect. They are warm, cute, and comfy! I wanted a winter boot that wasn't bulky, and was easy to get on and off - these are perfect! The zipper on the side makes them extremely easy to get on and off and they are not a big bulky winter boot.
customer_reviews.author: Momof3

customer_reviews.title: Keeps my feet warm.
customer_reviews.text: Glad I bought these. Plenty of for to put on an extra pair of socks. Will likely have to upgrade eventually to a removeable liner.
customer_reviews.author: Butterfly's Swifty

customer_reviews.title: Great winter boot. Not a winter hiking boot.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome winter boots. The trial run was in the Grand Tetons. Kept my feet super warm for all my winter activities. The only "cautious" advice I would give is do NOT wear these as winter hiking boots. They are not designed for rugged hiking. On the other hand, they are super cute and airport friendly.
customer_reviews.author: EHeath

customer_reviews.title: Amazing winter boots
customer_reviews.text: These snow boots look and feel great. They are true to size (6.5 size)..I haven't worn them in freezing temperatures but they were super warm when I tried them on with just cotton socks. Footbed support and feel is nice. They do feel tiny bit stiff but not to the point that I feel uncomfortable walking in them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon rocks...

customer_reviews.title: Love them, so far!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these beauts for the upcoming snow season. Haven't had a chance to put them to the test, but my first impression is that they're awesome! They have a roomy fit, which is ideal for thick socks and they feel cushy and warm. I have a feeling these will quickly become my favorite boots for years to come. Good tread, stylish, seemingly well made.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THESE!!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE LOVE LOVE these!! I bought them before last winter and we didn’t have as many cold/snowy days as we usually have to wear them. I want to wear all the time! They are so comfortable and warm!
customer_reviews.author: SARAH E DERR

customer_reviews.title: I’m so glad that I bought these boots
customer_reviews.text: I’m so glad that I bought these boots. They are lightweight, very warm and waterproof. They are look good with jeans. Width is adjustable, which is great!
customer_reviews.author: DE9911

customer_reviews.title: Wear with thick socks.
customer_reviews.text: Make sure you wear thick socks. I thought I could get away with just regular socks, but my feet got cold in 36° weather and even 45° weather in Texas. I love they way they look and are comfortable to wear, stand, walk in.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Great boot
customer_reviews.text: Great boot. Comfortable good support in foot bed. Waterproof and good in snow. Keeps feet warm and dry. Great for long winter dog walking.
customer_reviews.author: lee hartsell

customer_reviews.title: GREAT BOOT
customer_reviews.text: ALTHOUGH TO BIG. THESE WHERE THE SAME ONES THAT THE DEPARTMENT STORES CARRY. HEAVY DUTY STUFF HERE. HOWEVER NOT A LOT OF FLEXIBILITY IN THE SOLE OF THE BOOT. BUT GOOD AND WARM AND WILL KEEP YOU DRY.
customer_reviews.author: MIXUPAGAIN

customer_reviews.title: Love, Love
customer_reviews.text: These boots are just as cute as they look and they are the warmest boots I have ever worn. I live 9200 feet up in the mountains and Colorado and these shoes are fabulous. Love, Love, Love them!
customer_reviews.author: Laura L. Commers

customer_reviews.title: If any one want to buy this who lives in snow and ice places don't !
customer_reviews.text: This shoes are good warm but they are not slip resistant , I just slip on black ice and broke my wrist . I brought this shoes because this company had good name and trusted the product😕!
customer_reviews.author: n&micky

customer_reviews.title: Feet Stayed Dry
customer_reviews.text: Love them. They are so comfortable and they broke in after hiking in them once. They are sized perfectly for winter boots...a little larger so you can wear thick or two pairs of socks. I hiked after some snow melted and my feet stayed dry.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: Great tough boots!
customer_reviews.text: I love these. I work outside and on my feet. These are comfortable but I still replaced insoles with gel type. No pain in legs or knees from all day daily wear. Very warm and and good buy.
customer_reviews.author: shanon

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, supportive boot!
customer_reviews.text: I love the foot bed, very supportive for my wider foot. The calf is adjustable so the fit is perfect. Comfortable for walking inside and excellent traction outside.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Another 10 years I hope!
customer_reviews.text: My second pair of Keen winter boots. The last ones are 10 years old and if my foot did not get bigger a half size I would still be wearing them. I work outside 50% of the time and I need comfort and no slip and warm. These fit the bill. I would highly recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: O's Organics

customer_reviews.title: Comfy, Warm and Waterproof!
customer_reviews.text: Love these Boots, they are my go to. I have bad plantar fasciitis and this boots are super comfortable. Waterproof and warm. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: buy the boots 1/2 size bigger than usual size.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these boots after my old boots fell apart. These boots arrived just in time since MA had the bomb cyclone blizzard last week. I needed sturdy and waterproof boots to wear while I shoveled out my car. Boots worked and my feet were warm and dry. I have other Keen shoes. This time I remembered to purchased the boots 1/2 size larger than I normally wear.
customer_reviews.author: Harriet Yoffee

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this boot
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this boot. I've been a Keen custimer for many years. I needed something waterproof and taller for snow. They are so comfortable since my foot fits deeply into the shoe and it has a wide toe box. I particularly like that it has a zipper and laces for a custom fit. The sole is grippy like many of Keen hiking and utility shoes. Lastly this boot is a bit slender and fitted at the ankle with fur on top which makes for a more curvy sleek style. They broke in quite nicely and quickly and keep my feet warm. They're perfect for my needs!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: So far they have been comfortable and warm
customer_reviews.text: So far they have been comfortable and warm. It has been around 10-20 degrees with some snow and they seem quite capable at those temperatures. Good traction so far.
customer_reviews.author: Kitty Pryde

customer_reviews.title: Nice and comfertable
customer_reviews.text: I have worn these boots for the past week. They fit really well, true to size. I am a size 11 and I am able to wear thicker socks with no problem. Easy on and off with the side zipper. Nice thick tread on the bottom. Perfect for the Minnesota Winters.
customer_reviews.author: Toni McDonald

customer_reviews.title: Extremely pleased. I love to hike
customer_reviews.text: Extremely pleased. I love to hike, especially in the snow, and my new KEEN boots are awesome. These are super warm, super comfortable, super cute, top quality, and I didn't even have to "wear them in." This is an extremely light boot and will feel like an old friend from Day 1. Now I just need KEEN gloves, a coat, and a hat!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff K.

customer_reviews.title: Love these boots so far although I haven't been able ...
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots so far although I haven't been able to use them much as there's been no snow. They fit as expected and are comfy. I like the zipper and the colors. Can wear them to shovel snow and commute to work.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Opinion

customer_reviews.title: Cute,not clunky
customer_reviews.text: I always buy Keens. I have a mid level hiking boot, a work shoe, and now these beauties that are both functional and fashionable. I love love love them!!
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Emmer

customer_reviews.title: Great boot
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a half size bigger and they are perfect with warm socks. The laces make it easy to fit to the size of your leg. I haven't worn them out yet but they are comfortable walking Round the house. After trying 6 other boots im happy to have found them and waited until they were cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Ann M Usinger

customer_reviews.title: Snuggly Boots Ready For Winter
customer_reviews.text: Too soon to provide a complete review. Need to wear them in winter weather conditions which have not yet come our way as of yet. We will revisit this review later this winter.
customer_reviews.author: Don A Blake

customer_reviews.title: VERY THAPPY WITH THE PURCHASE WARM AND COMFORTABLE!
customer_reviews.text: i will use only December time but it seems very strong shoes and very comfortable holding the fit properly. VERY VERY LIGHT!!!
customer_reviews.author: Shirley Gutwerg

customer_reviews.title: Great traction. Waterproof. Warm. Stiff.
customer_reviews.text: I like these boots a lot! However, they are stiff and will take some breaking in. The heal cup comes up a bit high and rubs my ankle. I am hoping this will ease over time. I also really like the zipper option for quick on and off.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline Wall

customer_reviews.title: Love these boots!
customer_reviews.text: Great foot support. The laces allow for an adjustable fit around the ankle...with the convenience of a quick zip on. I did order up a half size.
customer_reviews.author: Gracie

customer_reviews.title: Comfort & style
customer_reviews.text: These boots fit comfortably right away. Broke them in during our first snow & slush storm of season. Feet stayed dry & warm. Stylish looking as well! Love the fact they have both laces & zipper for different occasions, if needed. Extremely satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: jean herlihy

customer_reviews.title: Love these boots!
customer_reviews.text: I wore these boots with a foot warmer to a winter Packers game and my feet stayed toasty warm and dry. If you plan on wearing heavy socks get a 1/2 size larger. They are also super cute.
customer_reviews.author: Greenfire

customer_reviews.title: Buy the size you wear
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots. But all the reviews suggested to buy them a half size larger. So I did and there is way too much room in the shoe. Other than that these are very comfortable and keep my feet toasty warm. It has yet to snow in my area so I have not put them to that challenge. I would definitely buy these boots again but I would order them in my original size.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi Newton

customer_reviews.title: keep your feet dry and have great traction. Buy them
customer_reviews.text: These boots are stylish, warm, keep your feet dry and have great traction. Buy them!
customer_reviews.author: C.H.

customer_reviews.title: ... long as you don't tie them to tight there good. If you do they hurt your feet
customer_reviews.text: As long as you don't tie them to tight there good. If you do they hurt your feet. Other than that. These are my favorite boots. A little big but I can were extra thick socks and be comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Paula Sumner

customer_reviews.title: Boots for a W foot
customer_reviews.text: I bought Keens because I have a wide foot, and I know they will fit. Sometimes I am a 10, and sometimes I am a nine and a half. I ordered both. The 10 fit perfectly; the 9 1/2 was not accommodatin of thick socks. The Raven is a nice grey / black. Sturdy and comfortable. Not disappointed at all.
customer_reviews.author: Suz E

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So sturdy, comfortable, and warm. Thrilled with these, and the brown were only $60.
customer_reviews.author: PS

customer_reviews.title: well made boots
customer_reviews.text: These boots are beautiful! They are a bit stiff on top, but the foot is very comfy and they are super light in weight. Hoping they are warm this winter.... nice construction. I wear a 7.5 shoe...got size 8 in these boots and they fit nice without heavy socks. the zipper release was crucial for me, and so hard to find.
customer_reviews.author: jane m

customer_reviews.title: Nice boot, watch for correct size.
customer_reviews.text: My wife has worn the same size for 40 years, and these are just not the size listed.
customer_reviews.author: Harry

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit Warm feet -13 degrees F. Love these boots.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Sorlien

customer_reviews.title: Nice, warm, well-constructed boot
customer_reviews.text: I haven't been able to wear these in the cold since it's summer right now, but I did try them on and they fit very nice and feel like they will be warm
customer_reviews.author: ADL

customer_reviews.title: So far I really like these boots
customer_reviews.text: So far I really like these boots, the fit is great I ordered half size bigger and worked out great, they keep you feet very warm.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Jansma

customer_reviews.title: Great boots, I can wear these all day inside ...
customer_reviews.text: Great boots, I can wear these all day inside and outside and my feet never get to hot or cold.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi Kirkwood

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: really love these boots, especially the zipper on the side for easy on/off
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: comfortable and look great
customer_reviews.text: Warm, dry, comfortable and look great. As good as it gets!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: but I especially like the zipper
customer_reviews.text: very warm, but I especially like the zipper, makes it so easy to get in and out of, and the laces can adjust to your calf size.
customer_reviews.author: teb

customer_reviews.title: Great boots, lightweight and I love that I can ...
customer_reviews.text: Great boots, lightweight and I love that I can lace them up once to be as snug as I want and then have the easy zipper on the side to put them on every day. I don't like winter but I am looking forward to wearing these...goodbye cold wet toes
customer_reviews.author: Heidi Piette

customer_reviews.title: Keen Womens Hoodoo Boot
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these boots, they are warm and comfortable, and have a good tread on them. They fit true to size.
customer_reviews.author: lorenj2009

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable boots
customer_reviews.text: I sized up like the other reviews suggested and this gives me e tough room for wool socks. These are very comfortable boots. I would highly recommend to others.
customer_reviews.author: S. Bruce

customer_reviews.title: Lite weight and waterproof
customer_reviews.text: Received the boots even a day ahead of time! I purchased 1/2 size larger than normal for thick sock wearing and I’m glad I did. Very happy with lite weight and stylish look. Will wear soon due to new accumulating snow.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: With the side zipper I can easily get these boots on
customer_reviews.text: I have a high arch which sometimes causes trouble fitting my foot down and into lace up or pull on boots. With the side zipper I can easily get these boots on. They keep my feet warm. There's not much cushion inside (hence 4 stars). going to try to add a heel cushion inside them.
customer_reviews.author: Heather D.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect. Comfortable and cute
customer_reviews.text: Bought these specifically for taking walks when there's too much snow to wear sneakers. Perfect. Comfortable and cute.
customer_reviews.author: Slagette

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Boots!
customer_reviews.text: Love em'! These are my 3rd pair of Keen winter boots, other haven't worn out yet, just wanted a different look. Worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Kathie W.

customer_reviews.title: Love these boots
customer_reviews.text: Laces adjust to your size. Then you just zip and go. I love the toe room and support in all Keen shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen Marvin

customer_reviews.title: These boots are really beautiful. I purchased the Raven/Lagoon color and it is ...
customer_reviews.text: These boots are really beautiful. I purchased the Raven/Lagoon color and it is quite lovely. They are waterproof and look great on.
customer_reviews.author: Debrah

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great boots. Fit was a little big but with heavy socks it works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: my wife absolutely loved these keen boots. she said the most comfortable she ever had.
customer_reviews.author: tim b.

customer_reviews.title: it fits comfortable and as it's high I use it for the ...
customer_reviews.text: Its warm ,it fits comfortable and as it's high I use it for the heavy snow day walks.
customer_reviews.author: janneke huber

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice boots, a little tight around the calf, but fit ok size wise.
customer_reviews.author: Java230

customer_reviews.title: These KEEN boots are terrific. Super comfortable and warm
customer_reviews.text: These KEEN boots are terrific.Super comfortable and warm, but not bulky like my old Sorels. Wore them to Austria on a ski vacation and could wear them out to dinner too. Love'em!
customer_reviews.author: Gretchen

customer_reviews.title: Excellent versatile boot- warm & comfortable with technical grip soles that give good footing on ice, snow, uneven ground
customer_reviews.text: So comfortable to wear from casual walks with the dog to hiking on challenging terrain, they are warm, waterproof, and easy to get on & off with the side zipper. The laces can be used to tighten the ankle support once the boots are on. I love KEEN shoes & boots and I love these. I purchased & returned several boots, including the KEEN Durand Polar boot, until I found these.
customer_reviews.author: Therese Markert

customer_reviews.title: Fit well but looks a little cheap. Anyway I ...
customer_reviews.text: Fit well but looks a little cheap. Anyway I will keep them. Will see how they are going to handle Russian winter.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love these shoes.
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are cute and comfortable. I ordered a half size larger but ordering in my regular 7.5 was a much better fit.
customer_reviews.author: N. Davis

customer_reviews.title: These boots are the best I have ever owned
customer_reviews.text: These boots are the best I have ever owned. I hike in the woods everyday, all winter. They are so comfortable. They have great traction. And they are very warm. I highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Jewett

customer_reviews.title: Looks and quality
customer_reviews.text: THese looked better than expected. Extremely warm. So happy I got thiscolor too!
customer_reviews.author: Martha

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not water resistant and not as warming as they should. Comfy, though.
customer_reviews.author: Revital S.

customer_reviews.title: Lots of good attributes, yet the ankle top hit my leg ...
customer_reviews.text: Lots of good attributes, yet the ankle top hit my leg at an uncomfortable place and they were too painful wear - had to return them. I have other keen boots which work perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: sadie

customer_reviews.title: She said they fit perfect, are very comfortable and look great
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my wife for XMAS. She said they fit perfect, are very comfortable and look great. She wears them daily to work.
customer_reviews.author: 4wheel4food

customer_reviews.title: They fit great, they are warm
customer_reviews.text: They fit great, they are warm, practical look great and the zipper on the side is genius. Who wants to tie up frozen boot laces with snow and ice stuck to them anyway?
customer_reviews.author: ERIN

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect winter boots that keep your feet warm and dry in the worst weather. The size chart is accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Uttara

customer_reviews.title: I love these boots more than words can say
customer_reviews.text: I did so much research on the right boots. I love these boots more than words can say. SO warm and water resistant. So cute. Feel great as Keens always do. Fabulous
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Expensive, but warm, stylish and exactly what I needed for winter hiking!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

product_meta.title: KEEN Hoodoo III Women's Walking Boots - AW15
product_meta.description: Upper Keen Hoodoo III Women's Walking Boot is made with nubuck leather. To keep your feet warm, snug and comfortable, even in the depths of winter Keen Warm Trapolator insulation is provided with additional bamboo charcoal material which gives 360 degrees of warmth. Due to the high profile of the boot, ankle support and stability is improved increasing the protection afforded by the construction. Waterproof material and faux fur collar featured in the upper provide protection in wet and extremely cold conditions. Midsole Constructed from three different extra warm layers to keep the foot in constant warm and increase the protection from the cold. Extremely light EVA foam insulates and waterproofs the boots, further promoting comfort and dryness. Outsole Created from Dual Climate Rubber to increase the grip in unpredictable conditions.
feature_bullets: Made in the USA and Imported
Quilted waterproof boot featuring faux-fur collar and lace-up vamp
